description: This Dart file defines the NotesProvider class, which manages note data and operations such as creation, updating, deletion, and formatting within a Flutter application. It interacts with a NotesRepository for data persistence and notifies listeners of state changes.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier subclass that handles note state management for a Flutter app, providing methods to load, create, update, delete, and retrieve notes, as well as formatting timestamps.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Loads notes from the repository if not already initialized and updates the internal list.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with optional title and content, adds it to the list, persists data, and notifies listeners.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by its ID, updates its timestamp, persists changes, and notifies listeners.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Removes a note by ID from the list, persists changes, and notifies listeners.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its ID, returns null if not found.

methods.name: formatTime
methods.description: Formats a timestamp (milliseconds) into a human-readable string.

methods.name: _persist
methods.description: Saves the current notes list to the repository.

methods.name: _generateId
methods.description: Generates a unique ID for a new note using current timestamp and a random number.
